spell.cleannarsenal.flourish.name: Flourish
spell.cleannarsenal.flourish.description: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage} damage to nearby enemies..
spell.cleannarsenal.roll.name: Tactical Roll
spell.cleannarsenal.roll.description: Roll forward. At the end of the roll, you cleave around you, dealing {damage} damage to nearby enemies.
spell.cleannarsenal.shadewalk.name: Shadewalk
spell.cleannarsenal.shadewalk.descriptio: As you walk around, you leave behind shades and smoke. These shades repeat your flourish ability on top of them. Up to four shades can exist at a time.
spell.cleannarsenal.riposte.name: Riposte
spell.cleannarsenal.riposte.description: While casting this spell, you are immune to the next attack from an entity. Upon being hit this way, you react with a forward cleave for {damage} damage.
spell.cleannarsenal.magicmissile.name: Magic Missile
spell.cleannarsenal.magicmissile.descrip: Channel to build up magic missiles over your target over time. At the end of the channel, release all built up missiles one after the other, each dealing {damage} arcane damage.
spell.cleannarsenal.rumble.name: Rumble
spell.cleannarsenal.rumble.description: Cause tremors with your mighty battering ram, dealing {damage} dps to nearby enemies.
spell.cleannarsenal.pummel.name: Whirling Slam
spell.cleannarsenal.pummel.description: Channel to pummel nearby enemies for {damage} dps.
spell.cleannarsenal.pummel_normal.name: Whirling Slam
spell.cleannarsenal.pummel_normal.descri: Channel to pummel nearby enemies for {damage} dps.
spell.cleannarsenal.armor_break.name: Valiant Strike
spell.cleannarsenal.armor_break.descript: Strike an enemy for {damage} damage, gaining a stack of Valiant, up to 5. Each stack of Valiant gives you 8%% of damage taken regenerated over the next 4 seconds.
spell.cleannarsenal.earthquake.name: Cataclysm
spell.cleannarsenal.earthquake.descripti: Slam the ground, causing an explosion with strength {damage}, with up to two more explosions with the last one having triple strength depending on channel time. Damages all entities, but not blocks.
spell.cleannarsenal.rampage.name: Tremorwalk
spell.cleannarsenal.rampage.description: For the next 10 seconds, you sunder the ground as you walk, dealing {damage} damage to nearby enemies.
spell.cleannarsenal.barrage.name: Strafe
spell.cleannarsenal.barrage.description: Channel to shoot lightly homing arrows continuously, dealing {damage} ranged-frost hybrid damage per arrow.
spell.cleannarsenal.chain.name: Augment: Chain
spell.cleannarsenal.chain.description: Passive: Arrows chain towards the nearest enemy twice, but not towards one already hit, unless there are no more options.
spell.cleannarsenal.multishot.name: Augment: Multishot
spell.cleannarsenal.multishot.descriptio: Passive: Target two more enemies per shot.
spell.cleannarsenal.frostbloom.name: Augment: Frostbloom
spell.cleannarsenal.frostbloom.descripti: Passive: Your arrows explode in a nova, dealing {damage} frost damage in an area. This has a cooldown.
spell.cleannarsenal.fmj.name: Flaming Metal Jacket
spell.cleannarsenal.fmj.description: Channel to shoot upon release, with the damage reaching a peak at a sweet spot 75%% through the channel time. Deals {damage} ranged-fire hybrid damage to one enemy.
spell.cleannarsenal.dragonsbreath.name: Dragon's Breath
spell.cleannarsenal.dragonsbreath.descri: Unleash a puff of flames, dealing {damage} fire magic damage in a cone as well as heavy knockback.
spell.cleannarsenal.overblaze.name: Phoenix Cannon
spell.cleannarsenal.overblaze.descriptio: Devastate a straight line in front of you with flames, dealing {damage} ranged-fire hybrid damage to all enemies.
spell.cleannarsenal.lightsout.name: Lights Out
spell.cleannarsenal.lightsout.descriptio: Channel and aim at up to 6 enemies to shoot them all sequentially at the end of the channel. Deals {damage} ranged-fire hybrid damage to 6 enemies..
